byline.contributor: Douglas Dalby contributed reporting from Dublin.

abstract: Success of Martin McGuinness in attracting support for his bid as the Sinn Fein candidate in the election for the largely ceremonial position of president of the Irish Republic has been taken by many as a sign of reconciliation between the north and the south of the country.
snippet: The peace process in Ireland will be in the spotlight on Thursday as the nation holds its election for the largely ceremonial post of president of the Irish Republic.
lead_paragraph: The peace process in Ireland will be in the spotlight on Thursday as the nation holds its election for the largely ceremonial post of president of the Irish Republic.

headline.main: Irish Election Shows Signs of Erasing Boundaries
headline.print_headline: Irish Election Shows Signs Of Erasing Boundaries
headline.seo: Irish Presidential Election Offers Signs of Reconciliation
